person.persName: Melancthon Wade Oliver (Cincinnati, Ohio, clerk, lawyer and judge. )

body.p: Cincinnati, Ohio, clerk, attorney and judge. Ohio native. Son of Rebecca Oliver. Married to Ann E. Gere Oliver in Butler County, Ohio, in June 1850. Father of Lucy Oliver, Ellen Oliver, Fielding Oliver and Willard Oliver. Clerk in Cincinnati in 1850. Attorney in Cincinnati in 1860. Employed Mary Hufkiss as a servant in Cincinnati in 1860. Judge in Cincinnati in 1865.
